content.question: Which of the following is a feature of the Great Mosque of Djenn√© that demonstrates continuity with the West African tradition of building adobe structures?

choices.label: The construction of an exterior wall to protect the mosque from invaders
The inclusion of projecting beams to help with replastering the mosque
The placement of the mihrab to indicate the direction of Mecca
The position of the mosque near the marketplace to draw in believers

content.answer: The inclusion of projecting beams to help with replastering the mosque
